TopicTitle: the Super party on another planet

Articles.Content:
go and celebrate christmas on another planet! bring presents e.g. a nice christmaslike tree lander.

Easy mode: fly an rocket to duna and land to celebrate

hard mode: fly an SPACEPLANE to Eeloo and get something christmaslike.

no mods allowed

mission must have at least 1 kerbal

rocket or plane must look chrismaslike.

1+ points for less duration

1+ points if 2 presents. 2+ points if 3 presents....

1+ points for returning

1+ points for 3 crew

1+points for efficiency

1+ points if you impress me

you must give me a screenshot of it escaping kerbin, getting an encounter, landing.

Plane to Eeloo? Pffft. Impossible. Sorry.

It is possibly, proof is here

Or here is my spaceplane with delta-v 8k+, it is enough for round-trip to Eeloo with landing
